1241.content:
It was another bright morning at Yokai Academy for Kurumu to seduce Tsukune, the only human at Yokai. "Wait until Tsukune taste my cookies, I'm sure this will win him over from Moka." smiled the blue haired succubus. Kurumu than saw Tsukune but he was unfortunately with that troublesome vampire girl. However something was different about the pink haired girl. "Please Moka have some more of my blood." insisted Tsukune exposing his bare neck to Moka. "But Tsukune I already had some of your blood, and I had a huge breakfast today." "Come on Moka you know how sweet my blood is." Tsukune pointing at his neck enticing Moka to take another serving. "oh I really shouldn't, but your blood is the sweetest Tsukune." Moka confessed sinking her teeth in Tsukune who immediately expressed of sign of discomfort.

"Why is Tsukune trying to get Moka to drink his blood?" Kurumu pondered before noticing something crucial about Moka. The pink haired vampire girl was chunky! A new layer of fat had formed on Moka's typical svelte figure. Her legs were noticably thicker and even wobbled, her flat stomach was now bulging out straining her uniform, Moka's breasts were even bigger rivaling her own, even her face seemed softer. "It couldn't be that..." Kurumu began.

"Oh Tsukune! You're so affectionate!" giggled Moka as Tsukune wrapped an arm around her side. His arm pressing against her soft sides as his hand grabbed the side of her growing belly.

"Tsukune likes fat girls!" Kurumu gasped.

It was then that Tsukune and Moka noticed Kurumu. "Oh hey Kurumu" greeted Tsukune. "Oh hey Tsukune!" replied the succubus. The human boy then noticed the cookies in Kurumu's hand. "What cha got there?" he asked. Kurumu was planning on giving the cookies to him in order to impress him but she than thought of a better use of the cookies. "Oh I was just really hungry this morning." Kurumu says opening the bag and eating a cookie "I don't think I'm eating enough." The action lights up Tsukune's face "Yeah you should definitely get enough to eat. Its too common for girls these days to under eat." "Yeah those girls are too skinny." Kurumu said attempting to prove Tsukune's preference. Kurumu popped another cookie in her mouth "I mean why would a girl starve herself just to be thin?" Kurumu asked while chewing her cookie. "I couldn't agree more Kurumu." Tsukune was in total agreement with Kurumu's statement displaying a very joyful countenance.

"That proves it, Tsukune likes fat girls." Kurumu said in her mind. Kurumu gobbled the entirety of the cookies. "Hmm all gone and I'm still hungry, guess I'll have to go get more." smiled Kurumu noticing Tsukune's encouraging demeanor. "Heh heh now I know how to win Tsukune over once and for all." grinned Kurumu heading to the cafeteria.

Do something very interesting involving food and teleportation...
1242.content:
"What do you mean I don't have a chance with Tsukune?!" a flustered Yukari shouted.

It was break period between classes, and the young witch found herself arguing once again with the blue-haired bombshell named Kurumu about who'd be the best girlfriend for their mutual crush. And as usual, the topic quickly shifted to their body sizes and the drastic difference between them.

The top-heavy teen grinned smugly. "I'm just saying that he'd take these mountains over those pancakes any day!" and gave her two fleshy fun-bags a hearty squeeze to emphasize her point.

Not even Yukari could deny the fact that the succubus had the biggest pair of knockers in the entire school - far bigger than her still-developing body could ever hope to achieve. And as much as she hated to admit it, she just didn't have the bodily proportions to catch the eye of her beloved human boy. She was definitely the brains of the harem, but against the dynamite figures of Kurumu, the vampire Moka, and the snow-woman Mizore alike, she was hard-pressed to make much of an impression with book-smarts alone. Not that she'd ever say that out loud of course.

"Ugh, again with those milk bags of yours!" Yukari continued. "Tsukune can love me for more than my body you know!"

"Keep telling yourself that, short-stack."

"Don't call me that! And what's so good about giant boobs anyway? All you do is smother him half to death!"

"It's called 'skin-ship' and I'll have you know that Tsukune loves it when I do it! Who wouldn't want their face buried in these G-Cup beauties?"

And on they went. Their usual bickering mostly consisted of name-calling, cartoon-cloud fist fights, and sometimes the occasion flying bath pan to the head, but things stayed friendly more often than not. Today however was a different story. The young magic-user had been in a sour mood lately, courtesy of a one-point drop in her latest test score. Most students wouldn't have been too bothered, but for a perfectionist like her it was quite the blow to her pride. And unfortunately, her busty companion wasn't making things any easier. Even if her mood wasn't a factor, a girl could only be called "pancake chest" so many times before something snapped.

"You know something Boobzilla? If the rest of your body was as big of those jugs you'd be singing a very different tune!" Yukari declared, pointing a small finger at her ample-bodied classmate.

Annoyingly for her, Kurumu remained unfazed at the comment.
"Please, I could weight half a ton and Tsukune would still drool at sight of me! Just face it Yukari. I'm the best choice for him."

And with that, Kurumu turned about and headed down the hallway towards her locker, leaving a fuming Yukari in her wake. She was especially upset that Tits-for-Brains managed to have the last word, and seriously thought about sending another few wash basins her way while her back was turned.

Tempted though she was, it was best that she swallowed her pride and refrained from doing anything childish... well, anything too childish.

Oh, there's just gotta be a way too get back at her! the witch thought to herself.

But what could she possibly do? Everyone else in their merry group of ladies had her beat in almost every regard. She wasn't horribly athletic, her figure had all the sex appeal of a department store standee, and her youth was an upsetting but very understandable roadblock on the path to romance. Magic was by far her greatest strength, but she didn't exactly have the greatest track record with that either. Her above-average skill with a wand may have resulted in her skipping a few grades, but most of the spells in her arsenal were tailored to simpler tasks: cooking; levitating; housekeeping; things like that. All in all, there wasn't anything that could really put Kurumu in her place and mark a win in the 'Tsukune' column. That is, not until today.

Just when she was about to give up, Yukari had an idea. It wasn't much to go on at first, but the longer she thought about it the better it became. If Kurumu was so certain that she'd win Tsukune's heart regardless of her size, then what difference would some extra weight make?

Half a ton, huh? I think it's time to test that theory!

Using her smaller body to her advantage, she ducked and weaved between the stream of students making their way through the hall and slowly moved towards her target. She merely needed to have Kurumu in her field of vision for what she had planned, so it wasn't at all a tall order. After a few short moments, Yukari arrived a just few yards behind Kurumu's bouncing backside without tipping her off. This was going to be too easy.

With all the magical power she could muster, the little witch whispered the magic words that would teach that annoying Succubus a lesson once and for all. After a quick sentence or two, she gave her trusty wand and gentle wave and finished by pointing it directly at an unsuspecting Kurumu. It wasn't the flashiest of magic - her hair rustled a bit and the tip of her wand pulsed the faintest of colors - so nobody paid it any mind. Lack of fanfare aside, Yukari knew for a fact that it reached its intended target. With a wide grin on her cutesy little face, she turned on her heels and headed on towards her next class, humming ever so quietly at her success. If all went well, the magic would take effect in just a few minutes and...
1242.title: Yukari enchants her to get fat.

choices: The spell continues and she gains over 50 pounds
The spell goes out of control... with colossal results
12422.content:
The rest of Kurumu's morning classes passed by like they always did - far too slowly. The young woman knew full well that her grades in most of her subjects were below average at best, so she seldom saw the point in paying close attention to any of the lectures. Passing was still passing after all, even if it was just by a hair's breadth. What's more, it gave her more time to spend with her self-proclaimed boyfriend between classes, so it was a win-win in her book.

While she may have been happy in the grand scheme of things, there was little she could do to ease the day-to-day boredom that came with her education and today was certainly no exception. The clock just ticked past 11 o'clock as the teacher continued droning on about some other pointless date in yokai world history... or was it the human world? Kurumu didn't even pretend to be paying attention at this point, though she at least showed enough restraint to actually stay awake at her desk this time around. The prospect of spending another day in detention wasn't too appealing, so she made do with doodling and the occasional daydream to pass the time.

The young succubus also had something else going for her on this particular morning; her seat felt unusually comfortable. On any other day she'd be squirming and fidgeting almost nonstop as her poor excuse for a chair had its way with her lower back, but things were mercifully different today. Strange though it was, Kurumu certainly wasn't going to complain.

When the lunch bell finally rang, the blue-haired beauty took a good, long stretch before hoisting herself up from her desk. When she did though, she felt a noticeable pressure around her waist and paused for a few moments to inspect her clothing.

Hmm... my skirt feels kind of tight today. Did it shrink in the wash?

Her thoughts were interrupted by the sound of Tsukune's voice, and her mind promptly abandoned all things outfit-related to focus on something much more important. Kurumu turned about to lock eyes with her love interest, though she wasn't entirely thrilled to see the blood sucker and the ice queen locking their arms with his as they walked along. She'd be lying if she said she wasn't used to it, but the sight was still no more appealing.

"Ready to head to lunch Kurumu?" the brown-haired boy asked.

"You bet Tsukune!" the succubus chirped.

Happy as could be, Kurumu skipped off after her crush as the group made their way towards the school cafeteria, totally oblivious to the subtle (and entirely new) slapping sound coming from the young lady's thighs.

Lunch period was relatively uneventful, but Kurumu couldn't help but notice that Yukari seemed suspiciously cheerful since the moment she showed up to join them. She thought it a bit strange that the little witch wasn't fuming over their earlier conversation, but it wasn't really drastic enough to earn much more of her interest, so she eventually dropped the subject. Besides, she couldn't really be bothered when the cafeteria seats felt even more comfortable than the ones in the classroom.

Before she knew it, her class was getting ready for the following gym period. As all the ladies changed their clothes in the locker room, making idle chit-chat as usual, Kurumu made a somewhat alarming discovery: now her gym clothes were starting to feel uncomfortable. It was especially troubling considering how stretchy their school's athletic wear could be, so she was nothing if not a little distressed.

The ever-caring Moka noticed her friend's darkening expression, and her sympathetic demeanor took the next obvious step.
"Is everything alright Kurumu?"

"My clothes feel really tight today." Kurumu replied, and she gave her shrunken shorts a few tugs to emphasize her point.

Cold-blooded both figuratively and literally, Mizore didn't hesitate to go straight for the throat.
"Looks like someone's been eating too much dessert lately."

"You're one to talk." Kurumu snapped back. "I'm not the one who treats ice-cream as one of the basic food groups."

"That's right, I forgot. It's cookies and cakes for a succubus, isn't it?"

"Oh, very funny! FYI, I haven't gained an ounce since I enrolled here!"

"Anything you say, your heaviness." the snow woman quipped, followed by teasing bow at the waist.

"That's enough, both of you!" Moka shouted. "You two shouldn't fight over something like that."

Their companion's words did quite the trick to quell their tempers, but that didn't stop them from sharing one last sneer at each other before they went about their business. Moka however, had one more thing to add.

"And... and besides..." the pink-haired beauty began, an adorable blush materializing on her cutesy face. "We have co-ed activities today."

And with that, the topic of Kurumu's waistline ended as quickly as it began. The trio made their way outside with even more excitement than usual and the games were were soon underway. Though their conversation was over, the unpleasant thought still lingered in the back of Kurumu's mind.

She always controlled herself at mealtime, and she checked her weight every other day, so why was she having so much trouble fitting into her gym clothes all of a sudden? Did they shrink in the wash too? Or maybe she was just a little bloated from lunch? In any case, the succubus decided to push herself especially hard today to burn off any extra calories that she may have picked up.

One rigorous gym class later, an exhausted but very pleased Kurumu changed back into her usual attire and tackled the rest of the day's classes... but not before loosening her skirt a little bit.

I'll have to ask for another one this week. Something that won't shrink, she thought to herself.

Still riding her post-workout high, the succubus didn't think twice that her classroom chair was even more comfortable than it was before. As the school day drew to a close, Kurumu remained blissfully unaware of the changes happening to her body. The combination of loosening her skirt and wearing an already loose sweater in place of the traditional school uniform bought a little more time for Yukari's magic to do its work - and what wonderful work it was.

Completely unbeknownst to the succubus, the spell had already resulted in a impressive 30 pounds being added to her shapely frame since the day began and a good deal of that went to her backside, forming a cushion between her and any surface she lowered herself onto. The remainder of the excess padding was evenly distributed across the rest of her curvaceous body. Her hips widened but an impressive but not-yet-noticeable amount, the gap between her thighs disappeared entirely, her arms lost a fair bit of their former definition, her belly softened up just enough to avoid her attention, and her already stupendous chest swelled to an even more ridiculous size.

With classes finally over, all that remained was the newspaper club meeting, and Kurumu didn't hesitate to smother her loved one with her (increasingly) incredible assets once she arrived at the club-room. It had become a daily routine for Tsukune ever since he befriended the succubus, but his kindhearted nature and the ceaseless embarrassment that came with it pretty much blinded him to her slightly larger size and greater softness for the time being. Moka and Mizore failed to notice any difference as well, as they were too annoyed with their friend's constant need for physical contact with their man. Nobody seemed to notice any substantial change in the body of their companion - nobody except for one.

While everyone else remained ignorant of Kurumu's growing figure, Yukari was doing her best to keep a straight face. Things were going better than the young magician ever could've hoped. Every passing hour ushered in more pounds for her unknowing victim, and it would likely take a good few more before the heavy-chested teen finally noticed what was happening. At the rate she was going, Kurumu would be spilling out of her clothes by the next morning, and the thought of her teary-eyed, double-chinned face put a widening smile on Yukari's own. For the sake of her revenge though, she managed to keep a lid on her excitement until the club meeting drew to a close. With a few farewells and one last smothering for Tsukune, Kurumu and the rest of the group parted ways.

It wasn't until the busty bombshell arrived at her dorm room that she noticed something a bit disturbing. The three flights of stairs that had never given her trouble before had stolen a worrying amount of her breath away, and she wasn't too pleased with how hot her body felt once it reached the top. After racking her brain for an explanation, she arrived at a logical but ultimately laughable conclusion.

I think I might be getting sick. I should probably head to bed early tonight.

The hour wasn't terribly late, only about 8 o'clock, but it was dark enough outside to justify her decision to hit the hay a bit sooner than usual. In a matter of minutes, the young woman had brushed her teeth, combed her luscious hair, changed into a loose-fitting sleeping gown, and was already tucking herself in for the night. Even now she was still wholly unaware of the state her figure was in, and she'd be in for quite a rude awakening once the morning came.
12422.title: Cause Kurumu to gain a few pounds every hour

12431.content:
It was the day before Yokai Academy's parent day and a certain blue haired succubus was at the phones talking to her mother who was prying into her daughter's love life.

"Trust me mom, he's cute." Kurumu said.

On the other line was an more mature woman who sounded like she was eating. "Good-f I'm-mph so proud-mh d-of you mm-Kurumu." Her words barely understandable from speaking with a food filled mouth.

"You know its kindof hard to understand you when your eating mom."

Kurumu than heard an audible gulp "Now, tell me how far have you gone with this Tsukune boy dear."

"Uh um well you see." Kurumu nervously stammered trying to avoid telling her mother that she had never even kissed her "boyfriend."

"Tell me you've at least done it with him." Ageha sternly replied before chomping into some sort of meat.

"Yeah in fact Tsukune's my fiance." blurted out Kurumu.

"Oh excellent! I knew my daughter had it in her." Ageha praised her exaggerating daughter.

"Yep." Kurumu chirped now dreading telling Tsukune of her lie.

"I can't wait to see you two tomorrow. Oh and how's your weight dear? Are you eating enough?"

"Mo-oom I don't have to be fat to attract a lover!" whined the teenage succubus.

"I guess that means you're still thin." sighed Ageha. "You know succubi are known for their voluptuous figures."

"I've got big boobs." Kurumu stated as if she was trying to bargain.

"You know that's not enough Kurumu." Ageha flatly said. "A succubus should be heavy and corpulent."

"Gah you always say that!" Kurumu had grown tired of this re-occuring argument.

"Anyways I look forward to tomorrow. See you than, Kurumu."

"Uh yeah see ya mom" Kurumu hung up, frantically contemplating a way to get Tsukune to be her fiance by the next day.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile on the otherside of that conversation, an obese blue-haired succubus was sitting at a table loaded with fried chicken.

"That daughter of mine has always been underweight." Ageha said to herself before sinking her chompers into a greasy piece of crispy chicken. "I've always insisted that she ate more."

Ageha leans over the table to reach for more chicken causing her gargantuous tits to spill on the table.

"But if she has found a lover, I guess I can allow her body to be emaciated." Ageha groans as her flabby arm grabs the bucket.

"Maybe she'll gain weight after marriage." said a hopeful Ageha commencing the consumption of the bucket.
12431.title: Mother wants fat daughter

124312.content:
A lively day for Yokai Academy as students' parents visited the school. Among the clammoring parents was a certain obese blue-haired succubus. Ageha waddled up the entrance nimbling on some food she brought. Ageha distinguished herself from the other parents. While most of the other mothers were trim and dressed modestly, Ageha was fat and flaunted her curves in flamboyant attire. She wore a sparkling fur coat which she draped over her low cut pink dress that complimented her colossal tits that bobbed like buoys on her huge belly. The fat succubus showed a lot of thick cellulite ridden leg garnering much attention.

"Yokai Academy still looks like I remember it." Ageha spoke to herself gazing upon the buildings recalling her past.

"Now where is my Kurumu? She should be around here."

Seconds later, an affable Kurumu welcomed her mother. "Hey mom! You're looking good. Still as big as a house."

Just from a glance, Ageha was disappointed in her daughter. "Kurumu!" she seized Kurumu's attention "Have you been eating?"

"Of course mom. I always eat my fill." Kurumu nervously pressed her fingers together.

"Well you don't look like you do." scolded the upset milf.

"Aww come on! So what if I'm not eating as much as you suggest. It's not like it's a big deal."

"Kurumu you're thin! Down right scrawny even!"

"So I'm a little skinny. So what? Every other girl here is skinny look around." Kurumu extended her arms to emphasize her rebuttal.

"You're a succubus Kurumu. And succubi are known for their voluptuous figures. Just look at how small your boobs are to mine." Ageha pulled open her coat putting her lavish cleavage on display.

Kurumu covers her chest out of defeat. "But I have the biggest pair at school."

"They should be bigger." Ageha swiftly replied.

Ageha sighed.

"But as long as you've taken a lover I guess I can overlook your emaciation." Ageha compromised.

Kurumu let out a nervous chuckle "Uh yeah wait til you meet Tsukune."

The high-strung Kurumu led her obese mother to the classroom were Tsukune was, praying that Tsukune would play along with her ruse. As Kurumu walked with her mother through the halls, she couldn't help but worry for her slender waist line. Upon reaching the classroom they see ....
